app.name: Nothing To Hide
app.subtitle: an anti-stealth game where you are your own watchdog.
app.longtitle: Nothing To Hide: an anti-stealth game where you are your own watchdog.

fund.title: THANK YOU FOR PLAYING THIS DEMO!
staytuned: Be excited. This wasn't even a tenth of what the full game will be!
On the downside... this wasn't even a tenth of what the full game will be.
We've got a long way to go, and we need your help.
whycrowdfunding: Why crowdfunding? Well, this game is open source and uncopyrighted.
We're built for the public, and backed by the public!
And I know this is kind of ironic, being a satire of social media and all, but...

uncopyright.title: NOTHING TO HIDE HAS NOTHING TO HIDE
linkdescription: But most of all, uncopyrighted. That's right -
uncopyright.rehostthisgame: - Re-host this game on your website.
uncopyright.useartmusiccode: - Use the art/music/code in your own projects.
makeamod: - Make a mod where the main character is replaced with Princess Luna from the
hit cartoon show, My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic.
Well, actually, you'll probably get a cease and desist from Hasbro for that.
uncopyright.givinguppower: By giving up "power" over our art, our art can have more power.
